text: They make much of being devoted sisters. But Kim Kardashian didn't hold back when she attacked Kourtney and pregnant Khloe's dress sense during a trip to Japan, calling them'f * * * ing clowns '. In a new clip from Sunday's upcoming episode of Keeping Up With The Kardashians she sat her sisters down and told them :'So I got ta be real with you guys.
